import React,{ useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import YesIcon from '../assets/YesIcon.png' import NoIcon from '../assets/NoIcon.png' function Request({data}) { const onAccept = async () => { const _id = data._id console.log("id==>",_id) const username = localStorage.getItem('username') console.log("username==>",username) axios.put('http://localhost:3001/share',{_id,username,boardname,sender}) }; return (

Boardname :

{data.boardname}

Sender :

{data.sender}

) } export default Request
